mapper.select: SELECT sa.id sa_id, sav.id sav_id, sa.*, sav.*, IF (ssav.sku_id, 1, 0) isChecked FROM pms_product_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN pms_product_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.product_id = sav.product_id AND sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id AND sa.product_id = #{productId} LEFT JOIN pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav ON sa.sale_attr_id = ssav.sale_attr_id AND sav.id = ssav.sale_attr_value_id AND ssav.sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sa_id, sav_id
